Articles.Content: New to forums ( a little bit) I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO POST PICTURES. Please help. Not really pics from internet but from the ksp files like screenshots etc.

Upload your pictures to a 3rd part site, such as Imgur, Flickr, Steam, photobucket ect. Next get the direct link for it (It should end in the file extension, something like: [www.picsite/blahblahblah/picture](www.picsite/blahblahblah/picture).**jpg**)

The click the insert image button within the post formatting tools. Paste that URL and presto, you've inserted an image into your post.

Step 1 - Upload to [**Imgur**](http://imgur.com/).

Step 2 - Copy the URL of the [Photo](http://i.imgur.com/5RqL1Tz.jpg)

Step 3 - Surround the URL in [noparse]![5RqL1Tz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5RqL1Tz.jpg)[/noparse]

Step 4 - ???

Step 5 - Profit!

![5RqL1Tz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5RqL1Tz.jpg)
